name: Top Down Shooter Template
description:
A Simple Game example of the 8-direction movement template created using the Panda  engine. controlled with arrow keys. The User can shoot bullets by Mouse clicking.

Features:

-Press WASD to move

-Press P Pause the Game

-Mouse to aim and shoot

Full Code Download

https://github.com/SuperFranco16/TopDownShooter_Panda2_Template
